::Grounded::
Grounded seeing the bot charge at Aerotaur took a second to think.
'They accepted me right away so i must show my loyalty'
He put his brown hand to the ground and it started glowing green. A 
large wall of vines began to rise slowly in front of Aerotaur.

she

kitty
